name: Genji Tsuushin Agedama
overview: Based on the manga and anime of the same name, the titular hero Agedama goes into action to beat a monster clan led by an evil dragon. Each level works as an auto-runner (with the occasional platformer) that has the player attacking and dodging every monster that comes. Agedama can shoot projectiles, a roll maneuver or perform limited magic attacks. The kind of powers Agedama can use are dependent on the enemy pickups and the position of the indicator on the power gauge.
